title: Estimaker
description:
Estimaker is a webapp for modeling probability graphs. It helps visualize potential outcomes of complex events by providing a whiteboard-style interface and easily-connectable building blocks.


#### Target Audience
The target audience is futurists and accelerationists and effective altruism people. It integrates with many online predictions markets.

#### Next Goals / Checkpoints
We're currently working on the alpha release so the goal is to make it as user friendly as possible; get it into other peoples hands and let their feedback decide how it can become the best version of itself

features.name: Public Charts
features.description:
Public charts will be the embeddable version of a user's chart so that they can share it around the internet.

### Note for Nathan
The user's username is not even really necessary for publishing charts. So we'll move things under the `_/public/$slug` url just to match the pull request we took out in LessWrong.

features.name: Changing Title of Shared Project
features.description: When one person changes the title of a shared project, it doesn't change in the other person's window. Instead their window just asks them if they want to save (the original name, because it's now different from what is stored).
